com.brightcove.examples.adapters

Class VideoListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<VideoItem>
        • com.brightcove.examples.adapters.VideoListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class VideoListAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<VideoItem>
    ArrayAdapter class for rendering the grid cell items in the VideoGrid view
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Maximilian Nyman (max.nyman@anvilcreative.com)

      • getView

        public android.view.View getView(int position,
                        android.view.View convertView,
                        android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Updates and returns the grid item view container/wrapper at the provided position for the grid view
        Specified by:
        getView in interface android.widget.Adapter
        Overrides:
        getView in class android.widget.ArrayAdapter<VideoItem>
        Parameters:
        position - the item position to update
        convertView - the current/previous view container/wrapper for the row item. If null, then a new view will be created
